TopicTitle: Do you have time for another spaceplane?: The ETA Mk. I

Articles.Content:
Good evening, fellow kerbalnauts. I am here to introduce my first successful spaceplane, created over hours and hours of work and french fries, of which I somehow managed to dock with my space station for its maiden voyage.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited January 10, 2014 by Lone K.

Really nice no-nonsense design and same goes for your station too. well done sir.

Now add passenger capacity for the MK2.

Edited January 10, 2014 by Capt Snuggler
The two RCS tanks look like an overkill but otherwise good job. Docking my first spaceplane was one of the best experiences I had in KSP.

Oh, those two RCS tanks? Hehe... just for making sure I don't run out from haphazard maneuvers. Although I did have a stack RCS tank, I didn't think one would be enough, and the weight change is probably what helped a lot.
